trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting"></xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating"></xref>, and <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting"></xref> events of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting"> </xref>, <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating"> </xref>, és <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting"> </xref> eseményeit a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: The ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> methods to provide access to input parameters that are passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> methods of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control.
trans-unit.target: A ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs osztály a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A>, és <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A>módszerek átadott bemeneti paraméterek eléréséhez a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>, és <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A>módszerek a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>vezérlő.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Insert%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Update%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnDeleting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnInserting%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnUpdating%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: These parameters are accessed using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Ezek a paraméterek használatával érik el a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>tulajdonság.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs.InputParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: By adding a delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> event, you can examine and manipulate the values of the parameters and perform any additional preprocessing that is required.
trans-unit.target: Egy delegált kezelésére hozzáadásával a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, vagy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>esemény után vizsgálja meg és kezelheti a paraméterek is végre semmilyen további előfeldolgozás szükséges.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Ehhez a szótárhoz paramétereiben bármely módosítása hatással, mely metódus túlterhelési a művelet neve.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is set, you can only modify the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>van állítva, csak akkor módosíthatja az adatok objektum tulajdonságait a szótár elemeinek; nem adja hozzá, vagy távolítsa el a paramétereket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying business object at various times in its life cycle.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>vezérlő kezelni tud a különböző időpontokban életciklusa az alapul szolgáló üzleti objektumhoz használható sok események közzététele.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: A következő táblázat felsorolja azokat az eseményeket, és a kapcsolódó <xref:System.EventArgs>osztályok és az esemény kezelő delegáltak.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|`EventArgs` class|EventHandler delegate| |-----------|-----------------------|---------------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.
trans-unit.target: | Esemény |} `EventArgs` osztály |} EventHandler delegált |} |-----------|-----------------------|---------------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreating>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately before the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.
trans-unit.target: Azonnal az üzleti objektumhoz példányának létrehozása előtt következik be. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectCreated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs immediately after the instance of the business object is created.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, az üzleti objektumhoz példányának létrehozása után azonnal. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selecting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceObjectEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, mielőtt az adatok lekérésére. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceSelectingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.
trans-unit.target: Előzheti insert, update vagy delete műveletet végrehajtani. |} ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occurs after the data is retrieved.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, miután az adatok lekérésére. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the insert, update, or delete operation is completed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.
trans-unit.target: Után fordulhat elő, az insert, update vagy delete műveletet végrehajtani. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.ObjectDisposing></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before a business object is destroyed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Akkor következik be, mielőtt olyan üzleti objektumot megsemmisül. |} <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceDisposingEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs"></xref> class using the specified input parameters collection.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventArgs"> </xref> osztály használata a megadott bemeneti paraméterek gyűjteményében.

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"></xref> of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"></xref> objects that represent the names of the parameters of the business object method and their associated values.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref href="System.Collections.Specialized.IOrderedDictionary"> </xref> a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter"> </xref> objektumok, amelyek megfelelnek az üzleti objektumhoz módszer és a hozzájuk tartozó értékek a paraméterek nevei.

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection that contains business object method parameters and their values.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi az üzleti objektumot a metódusok paramétereihez és azok értékeit tartalmazó gyűjtemény.

trans-unit.source: Parameters can be passed to the business object method by reference or by value.
trans-unit.target: Paraméterek átadhatók az üzleti objektumhoz módszer hivatkozással vagy értéket.

trans-unit.source: If you use an <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler> object to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Inserting>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting> events, you can access and manipulate these parameters using the InputParameters property.
trans-unit.target: Ha egy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>objektum kezelni a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Updating>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Inserting>, vagy <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting>események, elérheti, és ezek a paraméterek InputParameters tulajdonság használatával kezelheti.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Deleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Inserting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Updating> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceMethodEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Any changes to the parameters in this dictionary will affect which method overload is called for the operation.
trans-unit.target: Ehhez a szótárhoz paramétereiben bármely módosítása hatással, mely metódus túlterhelési a művelet neve.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> control is set, you can modify only the data object properties for the items in this dictionary; you cannot add or remove parameters.
trans-unit.target: Ha a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource>van állítva, módosíthatja, hogy csak az adatok objektum tulajdonságait a szótár elemeinek; nem adja hozzá, vagy távolítsa el a paramétereket.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.DataObjectTypeName%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>.
trans-unit.target: További információkért lásd: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource.Delete%2A>

trans-unit.source: Parameters that are passed by reference are returned in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Hivatkozással átadott paraméterek vissza a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>tulajdonsága a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs>objektum.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSourceStatusEventArgs.OutputParameters%2A>

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> of name/value pairs that represent the business object method parameters and their corresponding values.
trans-unit.target: Egy <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>, amelyek megfelelnek az üzleti objektumot a metódusok paramétereihez és a hozzájuk tartozó értékek név-érték párokból.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>
